fields.description:
If yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs is not explicitly set, and if the default local-dirs are not the children of hadoop.tmp.dir, the exception will occur when the wordcount example is run. Bellow is log info.

==========

Below is the setting in hdfs-site.xml.

==========

<property>
    <name>hadoop.tmp.dir</name>

</property>

==========

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Exception when yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs is not explicitly set
